mapper.select: select tc.* from t_credit tc inner join t_supp ts on tc.SUPP_ID = ts.SUPP_ID and tc.DISTR_ID = #{distrId} and tc.STATE = #{state} and ts.SUPP_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

select td.DISTR_NM, td.LEVEL_ID from t_credit tc inner join t_distr td on tc.DISTR_ID = td.DISTR_ID and tc.SUPP_ID = #{suppId} and tc.STATE = #{state} and td.DISTR_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

select t1.CREDIT_ID, t1.SUPP_ID, DISTR_ID, CREDIT_AMOUT, USED_AMOUT, STATE from (select credit_id, supp_id, distr_id, credit_amout, used_amout, state from t_credit where STATE = #{state}) as t1 inner join t_supp ts on t1.SUPP_ID = ts.SUPP_ID and ts.SUPP_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

select t1.CREDIT_ID, t1.SUPP_ID, t1.DISTR_ID, t1.CREDIT_AMOUT, t1.USED_AMOUT, t1.STATE from (select credit_id, supp_id, distr_id, credit_amout, used_amout, state from t_credit where STATE = #{state}) as t1 inner join t_distr td on t1.DISTR_ID = td.DISTR_ID and td.DISTR_NM like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')
